Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Team

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Team
public class Team extends Object
Class that manages the teams' game objects.

    • addTower

      public void addTower(Tower tower)
      Adds a tower to the list of the towers not built by the team. Additionally, if the Team hasn't a TowerColor, defines it using the Color of the new Tower.
      Parameters:
      tower - the tower to add.
      See Also:
      • Tower

    • popTower

      public Tower popTower() throws TowerNotSetException
      Removes a tower from the list of towers that have not been built by the team. If no tower is in the list of towers, throws TowerNotSetException.
      Returns:
      the first element of the towers owned by the team.
      Throws:
      TowerNotSetException - if no tower is available.
      See Also:
      • Tower

    • getProfessorTable

      public ArrayList<ProfessorPawn> getProfessorTable()
      Gets the professor pawns owned by the players in the team.
      Returns:
      the list of professor pawns owned by the team.
      See Also:
      • ProfessorPawn

    • addProfessorPawn

      public void addProfessorPawn(ProfessorPawn professorToAdd)
      Adds a professor pawn to the list of professor pawns owned by the players in the team.
      Parameters:
      professorToAdd - the professor pawn to add.
      See Also:
      • ProfessorPawn

    • removeProfessorPawn

      public ProfessorPawn removeProfessorPawn(PawnColor color) throws NoSuchElementException
      Removes from the list of professor pawns owned by the team the professor pawn whose color matches color. If the pawn is not available, throws a NoSuchElementException.
      Parameters:
      color - the color of the professor pawn to be removed.
      Returns:
      the professor pawn whose color matches color.
      Throws:
      NoSuchElementException - if a professor pawn whose color is equal to color is not found.
